Row.Text: A Great Revolutionary has been born in {1_Desc}!

Welcome! This brief summary will seek to explain the new gameplay component: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Great Revolutionaries[ENDCOLOR].[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Great Revolutionaries are a new Great Person that can be used to choose an Ideology. This replaces the ability to unlock an Ideology by constructing three Factories. Great Revolutionaries are granted for free to Civilizations that research certain late-game Technologies before any others - the specific Techs are random each game. With the Community Patch mod, expending a Great Revolutionary for an Ideology becomes a standard mission, but without, it is automated. Great Revolutionaries may also be expended to trigger a Culture Bomb.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]In addition, Ideologies are no longer automatically unlocked on entering the Modern Era. Instead, they are automatically unlocked for all players when all three Ideologies have been taken by at least one civilization.
